description: Trading mode agent weight profiles - Configure how different agents are weighted for each trading horizon

Scalping.focus: Order flow, liquidity, quick patterns, tight spreads

rationale.microstructure: Highest priority - Order book depth, spread, and liquidity critical for scalping execution
rationale.technical: Quick technical signals for entry/exit timing
rationale.pattern: Short-term chart patterns (flags, pennants) for rapid trades
rationale.sentiment: Real-time market sentiment drives ultra-short moves
rationale.risk: Tight stop-loss management essential for scalping

Intraday.focus: Technical patterns, market sentiment, intraday momentum

rationale.technical: Highest priority - Technical patterns and indicators drive intraday moves
rationale.sentiment: Market sentiment and news catalyze within-day momentum
rationale.pattern: Intraday chart patterns for entry/exit timing
rationale.microstructure: Order flow matters but less critical than Scalping
rationale.policy: Policy news can trigger intraday volatility

Swing.description: Multi-day to long-term trades (3 days to months)
Swing.focus: Macro trends, fundamentals, multi-day patterns, policy, structural trends

rationale.global: Highest priority - Global macro trends and market correlations drive multi-day moves
rationale.policy: Policy events, macro data, and regulatory changes are major drivers
rationale.technical: Technical analysis for trend identification and entry timing
rationale.pattern: Multi-day patterns (H&S, triangles, channels) for setups
rationale.risk: Risk assessment crucial for longer holding periods
rationale.microstructure: Minimal relevance for multi-day to long-term trades
rationale.watchlist: Quality fundamentals matter more than short-term momentum

notes.customization: Adjust weights based on backtesting results and market conditions
notes.sum_constraint: All agent weights must sum to exactly 1.0 (100%)
notes.utility_agents: trade_strategy, auto_monitoring, personalization should always have 0.0 weight (not scored)
